meanings.definition: The quality or state of being desirable.
meanings.sent1: The desirability of the toy made all the kids want it.
meanings.sent2: The desirability of the house led to multiple offers from buyers.
meanings.sent3: The desirability of the cake was so high that it disappeared within minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her desirability as a friend was unmatched, always there to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The desirability of the vacation package was evident from the long waiting list.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is desired or sought after.
meanings.sent1: The desirability of the job position attracted many applicants.
meanings.sent2: The desirability of the car model made it sell out quickly.
meanings.sent3: The desirability of the new video game caused a frenzy at the store.
meanings.sent4: His desirability as a team member was evident from his exceptional skills.
meanings.sent5: The desirability of the limited edition sneakers was undeniable among sneaker enthusiasts.
